sn46.22:0.3: 22. A Teaching on the Awakening Factors
sn46.22:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the seven awakening factors.
sn46.22:1.3: And what are the seven awakening factors?
sn46.22:1.4: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
sn46.22:1.5: These are the seven awakening factors.”
